name: ClientFusion-CRM
desc: CRM System! This console-based software solution is designed to streamline customer interactions and boost overall customer satisfaction.

name: RideCar
desc: Developed a console project in Core Java that simulates a ride car system, providing functionalities for admin, passenger, and driver roles.

name: Retax-CRM

name: Flickster
desc: Flickster is a dynamic web project that aims to replicate the key features and user experience of the Zee5 online streaming platform.

name: LadyCare
desc: This LadyCare website is implemented using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The goal of this project is to demonstrate basic e-commerce functionalities such as adding items to the cart, making a purchase, filtering products, and searching .
